author: JasonAce13
description: This module activates as soon as the bomb timer starts. Whenever you solve another module, the temperature gauge will increase by a random number between 5 and 20. Whenever one second passes, the temperature will decrease by 1. If the temperature ever goes over 50, the player will get a strike.
name: Temperature
notes: Author may be difficult to contact, please check 'Old Manual Spreadsheet' if you want better contact details.
